data.actual_result: The playing status gets stuck until you restart the app
data.expected_result: The playing status goes away because you're no longer playing the game
data.short_description: Removing a playing status doesn't remove it locally
data.steps_to_repro: - Start playing a game/Listening to Spotify and ensure it's detected as a playing status - Stop playing the game/Listening to spotify so your status gets removed - Observe your playing status in the member list and user settings and compare it with the desktop app
